data.text: The art or process, originating in Japan, of folding paper into shapes representing flowers and birds, for example.
data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: A decorative object made by folding paper.
data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.
from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.

data.text: A piece of art made by folding paper.
data.attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.

data.text: the Japanese art of folding paper into shapes representing objects (e.g., flowers or birds)
